name: DRUG POLICY ALLIANCE
description: Not-for-profit organization seeking to reduce the harms of drug use and drug prohibition
sampleDescriptions: Federal government removal of the District of Columbia budget rider that prohibits the District of Columbia from amending its drug laws relating to substances on the Schedule I drug list.
